title: un padam nambina
sahitya:
un padam nambina unadaDimai nAn O SaNmukha nAthA umA suta


anupallavi

  anbilan Ayinum vEru tuNaiyilEn ANDaruL pazhani ANDavanE muruganE


caraNam    daNdapANi unai bhajippOrkku yama daNDanai Edu aNDar paNiyum
 kOdaNdapANi marugA guHA nIlakaNThana mainda murugA kandanE
